name: Gupp Maker: Level Creator
description:
Gupp Maker is a platformer game where you can create your own levels with more than 50 types of blocks and share them with your friends!

Complete the adventure, play with your friends and create your own blocks!, In Gupp Maker there are hours of fun waiting for you! 🔨

Details:

- Adventure Mode 🦸‍♂️

- Level Creator 🔨

- More than 50 types of blocks!

- Blocks Creator
